common.name: Indomitable Fighter
common.flavour_text: In this world scorched by the flames of war, the only thing a man can truly rely on is vigor unyielding. I strive to rise above all as a champion to be carved into legend.
common.skill_text: Enhance (4): Give this follower +3/+3.

evo.flavour_text: To create a world where the embers of war have long since burned out, I march on. Those who would seek to snuff out my ambitious flame in their contempt will need to face my steel.
evo.skill_text: Enhance (4): Give this follower +3/+3.

common.name: Leah, Bellringer Angel
common.flavour_text: The bells are a little heavy, but the joy of delivering their tolls to the ears of all far outweighs them. That ringing in your ears is a sign that the heavens have blessed you! Ding-dong, ding-dong!
common.skill_text:
Ward Last Words: Draw a card.
Evolve: Draw a card.

evo.flavour_text: The bells of joy have reached your ears! Seeing everyone's smiles makes me so happy, I'm going to ring them again! Ding-dong, ding-dong!
evo.skill_text:
Ward Last Words: Draw a card.
Evolve: Draw a card.

common.name: Quake Goliath
common.flavour_text: To the gargantuan warrior, naught else matters but a physique as forged as steel. His chest has never felt the reassuring embrace of armor, as he cares only for protecting his vulnerable skull.
common.skill_text: Ward

evo.flavour_text: An ordinary soldier dons their armor in fear of the battles to come. If this titan goes so far as to don protection's hard shell, it is so that he may become invincible in the face of both stone and sword.
evo.skill_text: Ward

common.name: Detective's Lens
common.flavour_text:
The detective peers at an officer through her trusty lens; she spots the truth cunningly hidden within his declaration at the crime scene. 
"You can count on my killer skills during this investigation."
common.skill_text: Engage: Destroy this card. Select an enemy follower on the field and remove Ward from it.

questions.question: Can I engage Detective's Lens even if there aren't any enemy followers on the field with Ward?
questions.answer: Yes. Doing so will simply destroy it.

questions.question: Can I engage Detective's Lens even if there aren't any enemy followers on the field with Ward?
questions.answer: Yes. Doing so will simply destroy it.

common.name: Arriet, Luxminstrel
common.flavour_text: Long ago, the world was drowned in darkness, and all was still. Just as the people felt their own lives grow dim, a soft tune rippled through the oppressive darkness. As it grew stronger, so too did the people's will, and soon it became a song of hope.
common.skill_text: Evolve: Restore 2 defense to your leader. Super-Evolve: Restore 4 defense instead.

evo.flavour_text: Music transcends all—be it language, species, age, gender... or even time. A symphony will still sound grand no matter what your station in life is. So come, dear traveler, and listen as I play with all my heart.
evo.skill_text: Evolve: Restore 2 defense to your leader. Super-Evolve: Restore 4 defense instead.

common.name: Caravan Mammoth
common.flavour_text: Only the most senior of the merchants are granted the privilege of residing on the backs of the ancient mammoths. They are akin to a moving landmass, capable of carrying all of life's comforts. —A Caravan's Hierarchy, The Golden Age

evo.flavour_text: Mammoths typically sleep standing, ever alert to danger. Once they have become accustomed to the environment, they may sleep lying down. Such is the explanation given for the night the caravan fell. —A Caravan's Hierarchy, The Downfall

common.name: Adventurers' Guild
common.flavour_text: Folk from all manner of backgrounds gather together to tackle quests most arduous. This diversity begets all manner of new bonds forged. As long as there is work to be done, these halls will never empty.
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Draw a follower.
Engage: Destroy this card. Select an allied follower on the field and give it Rush.

questions.question: Can I engage Adventurers' Guild even if there aren't any allied followers on the field?
questions.answer: Yes. Doing so will simply destroy it.

common.name: Fairy Tamer
common.flavour_text: Fairies can be taught—they're just a bit cheeky is all. Yesterday's property destruction was a blessing in disguise, really. It's nice sleeping beneath the stars.
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Add 2 copies of Fairy to your hand.

evo.flavour_text:
Prancing on a gossamer leash.
—A woodland idiom used to describe someone manipulated by fairies
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Add 2 copies of Fairy to your hand.

common.name: Stray Beastman
common.flavour_text:
Keep your leashes and collars.
I'm taking back my freedom!
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Increase your Combo by 1.

evo.flavour_text:
A stray is homeless, directionless, and friendless.
He survives solely on willpower.
"Better lone wolf than underdog!"
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Increase your Combo by 1.

common.name: Gentle Treant
common.flavour_text: Neither plant nor animal, a lonely treant waits for his only visitor, a strange bird with opaline feathers whose colors play in the light. His leafy crown perks up as he hears a sound—not the soft flap of wings, but the crunch of a poacher's boot.
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Combo (3) - Evolve this follower.
Strike: Restore 2 defense to your leader.

evo.flavour_text: The poacher has come for the bird, its iridescent feathers. Cracking his not-branches and not-roots, the treant defends his only friend, realizing at last what he is. Not a plant or animal, but a home. And from then on, the lonely treant is lonely no more.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Combo (3) - Evolve this follower.
Strike: Restore 2 defense to your leader.

common.name: Wild Profusion
common.flavour_text: Poachers make such lovely flowers.
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Add a Fairy to your hand.
Countdown (2) Whenever an allied Pixie follower enters the field, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.

common.name: May, Journey Elf
common.flavour_text:
"I thought adults could do anything. But I was wrong. Maturity is accepting there are some things you can't do."
Still young, still with many leagues to journey, but a little older and wiser than yesterday.
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Combo (3) - Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 3 damage.

questions.question: If I play May, Journey Elf after playing 2 other cards this turn, will its Combo (3) ability activate?
questions.answer: Yes. The card being played also counts toward your Combo.

evo.flavour_text:
Adulthood isn't all it's cracked up to be.
Ninety percent of it is snores, bores, and chores.
But I still don't want to be a kid forever...
It's time I went from wardee to warden!
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Combo (3) - Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 3 damage.

common.name: Selwyn, Sonic Archer
common.flavour_text: Prey adapt. And the art of hunting must adapt along with it. "You're on their turf—you play by their rules. If you want to stay the hunter, that is."
common.skill_text:
Storm
Super-Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field and return it to hand.

evo.flavour_text:
Let me tell you something.
No matter how the rules of the game shift, how the players twist and turn, you will always be the hunted, and I will always be the hunter.
evo.skill_text:
Storm
Super-Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field and return it to hand.

common.name: Bug Alert
common.flavour_text:
Bugs swarm to warn and protect.
"Remember when you ignored them? That was a disaster and a half."
"Don't trot that old horse out now!"
The language of insects is one of wings and shapes.
common.skill_text: Select an allied card on the field and return it to hand. Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.

common.name: Flashstep Quickblader
common.flavour_text: Damn, you're slow! Better pick up the pace or you'll be eating my dust in your next life too!
common.skill_text: Storm

evo.flavour_text: The spirited young man speeds past ridicule and regret on his quest to become the fastest fighter in the world. To his detractors, he has but one thing to say: "Too slow!"
evo.skill_text: Storm

common.name: Arms Peddler
common.flavour_text:
A merchant's job isn't just about selling.
See, finding the best wares calls for a certain... resourcefulness.
common.skill_text: Rush Last Words: Draw a card.

evo.flavour_text:
Welcome, traveler! Not sure what to buy?
How about this shiny sword? Had to trade blows with an enemy soldier for 'er, and in the end, he left with his life and I with this "steel"! Hehe.
evo.skill_text: Rush Last Words: Draw a card.

common.name: Centaur Centurion
common.flavour_text:
His exploits on the battlefield pleased his superiors, and he was deemed fit to serve human society.
"Why tolerate these half-beasts? To win wars."
So spoke the founder of the Beastman Battalion before his untimely death.
common.skill_text: Storm

evo.flavour_text: What is humanity without its tools, its armor, its animal thralls? Beastfolk, on the other hand, are a force unto themselves. There was never any question as to who would emerge victorious from the dust of the Centaur Insurrection.
evo.skill_text: Storm

common.name: Way of the Maid
common.flavour_text:
To the nobility, class is more precious than life itself. How do you assert your class? Through arms? Force? No. You see it in the gleam of china and the bearing of a maid.
—Head maid of an unnamed manor
common.skill_text: Select a card in your hand and return it to deck. Draw 2 Swordcraft followers.

questions.question: If I return a Rusty, Luxcard Trickster with Storm from my hand to my deck with Way of the Maid, will the Rusty still have Storm when I redraw it?
questions.answer: Yes. Cards returned from hand to deck retain effects applied to them.

common.name: Royal Coachwoman
common.flavour_text: Don't be silly, Princess. I won't be taking any detours to avoid bandits. This coach rides royal streets or none at all. Why, I wouldn't dodge even if my horse had his hooves aimed at my teeth.
common.skill_text: Last Words: Summon a Knight.

evo.flavour_text: My coach is carrying you, Princess. Won't do to run it into the mud. It's my firm belief that you are defined by the paths you take. So hold on tight. We'll fly through the scum, straight as an arrow.
evo.skill_text: Last Words: Summon a Knight.

common.name: Rusty, Luxcard Trickster
common.flavour_text: He's the joker of the deck—either a fool of a gambler or a master of disguise. Rusty could bet the fate of the world, and he'd still have that smug poker-face grin.
common.skill_text: Super-Evolve: Draw all copies of Rusty, Luxcard Trickster and give them Storm.

evo.flavour_text: Light and dark are sides of a coin; you can't know where fate'll fall until it's flipped. Everything in life's a gamble, so our ace, Rusty, bets on the world—and he hasn't lost yet.
evo.skill_text: Super-Evolve: Draw all copies of Rusty, Luxcard Trickster and give them Storm.

common.name: Ancestral Crown
common.flavour_text:
The weight of a crown is the weight of its history.
"Stop, you fools! Kill me, and you lose forever the greatest dynasty—"
Amid the roaring of the horde, the crown dropped onto the scaffold, silent as a feather.
common.skill_text: Countdown (4) Whenever an allied follower enters the field, give it +1/+1.

common.name: Dazzling Runeknight
common.flavour_text: I am no lady—I do not sparkle like a distant star. I am a legionnaire—and I blaze like the fires of war!
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Select a Mode to activate. 1. Spellboost your hand 2 times. 2. Earth Rite (1) - Give this follower +2/+2 and Ward.

questions.question: Can I select Mode 2 for Dazzling Runeknight's Fanfare ability even if I don't have any earth sigils?
questions.answer: Yes. Nothing will happen.

evo.flavour_text:
That glowing broad should be easy to aim for! There's no way staring at a bright light with a sniper scope could backfir—gah! My eyes!
—A very unfortunate sniper
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Select a Mode to activate. 1. Spellboost your hand 2 times. 2. Earth Rite (1) - Give this follower +2/+2 and Ward.

common.name: Witch's New Brew
common.flavour_text:
Ingredients: Moon-dried pork (his fave!), bat eye, nether toad
Recipe: Give it a sweet, slow burn over heartfelt flames ♡
Don't forget the armored scorpion! It made him cry tears of joy last time.
—Scribbling from a witch's notepad
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Draw a card.
Earth Sigil
Engage (1): Gain an earth sigil.

questions.question: I engage a Witch's New Brew, then play another Witch's New Brew from my hand. If I still have at least 1 play point, can I engage the second copy as well?
questions.answer: Yes, you can.

common.name: Foresight
common.flavour_text:
"A scintilla of light is all I need."
Only the wise are capable of brightening the dark with but the faintest light.
common.skill_text: Draw a card.

common.name: Truth Summons
common.flavour_text: Beware the false prophets and charlatans claiming wisdom. Trust them not at face value, and exercise a healthy skepticism.
common.skill_text: Summon a Clay Golem.

common.name: Remi & Rami, Two-Faced Witch
common.flavour_text:
There once was a witch named Remi—no, Rami—
Who loved to play tricks on the enemy.
Remi trembled and shook, disarmed them with her look,
Then Rami blew them away with her melody.
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Earth Rite (1) - Summon a Guardian Golem.
Super-Evolve: Select an allied Golem follower on the field, evolve it, and give it +3/+3.

evo.flavour_text:
Deception is the tool of the weak! 
Said those who mock the meek.
Yet for this little witch with power big and small,
It was the greatest weapon of all.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Earth Rite (1) - Summon a Guardian Golem.
Super-Evolve: Select an allied Golem follower on the field, evolve it, and give it +3/+3.

common.name: Blaze Destroyer
common.flavour_text:
My order to the beast will be simple: Burn it all.
Surely I will be the first to burn, but what of it? Such concerns will only impede progress.
—Remains of a singed research log
common.skill_text: On Spellboost: Reduce the cost of this card by 1.

evo.flavour_text:
A dragon requires the life force needed to survive through the ages.
A demon requires the infernal energy to plunge the world into darkness.
This creature possess great power, but no purpose.
evo.skill_text: On Spellboost: Reduce the cost of this card by 1.

common.name: Arcane Eruption
common.flavour_text: A duel? Please. I bet you can't even touch me!
common.skill_text: Deal 2 damage to all followers. Earth Rite (1) - Draw a card.

common.name: Searing Firenewt
common.flavour_text: These lizards shed scales as an act of rebirth; they spit fire as an act of butchery. Life and death, contained right in their biology. Thus, there is no environment they shun, no threat they fear. —World Encyclopedia of Beasts, Salamanders
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 1 damage.

evo.flavour_text: When a firenewt's tail regrows, it does so without any skeletal structure. This absence is actually a boon, for it allows the lizard's tail flame to bloom all the brighter. —World Encyclopedia of Beasts, Salamanders
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 1 damage.

common.name: Axe-Wielding Dragonslayer
common.flavour_text:
Father, you once told me that a dragonslayer must be as proud and solitary as the beasts we hunt. You forget our history. Did our predecessors not take up their blades to protect the weak?
Virtue is found in compassion, not solitude.
common.skill_text: Ward

evo.flavour_text:
She had the strength and nobility of a dragon. She had good intentions. But to a layperson, what is a beastslayer but the greatest beast of them all?
With each stroke of her axe, another bridge broken, another path closed.
evo.skill_text: Ward

common.name: Warrior of the Deep
common.flavour_text:
Finned, fanged, and fierce, sharkfolk are a dangerous species. They conform to a strict hierarchy, likely to keep the seas from running red.
When approaching one of their kind, be as the remora—docile and deferential.
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Deal 6 damage to the enemy leader.

evo.flavour_text:
Sharkfolk? They're the sole reason my business is all afloat. Guardians of the sea they are, keepin' all manner of creatures from running amok. So they're sticklers for status... We've all got our hang-ups.
—Local fisherman
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Deal 6 damage to the enemy leader.

common.name: Strike of the Dragonewt
common.flavour_text:
Humankind is industrious because it is weak. Generations upon generations have worked to hone woodwork, stonework, ironwork, and steelwork.
But what is a fire-forged blade when faced with fire made flesh?
common.skill_text: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 2 damage. If you're in Overflow, deal 4 damage instead.

common.name: Draconic Berserker
common.flavour_text:
A single insect stands no chance against a man. A swarm, however, can topple civilizations.
What horizons, then, might an army of dragons conquer? Perhaps only the gods can say.
common.skill_text: Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 4 damage. Super-Evolve: Deal damage to all enemy followers instead.

evo.flavour_text:
Man, beast, or dragon, a warrior seeks out battle.
But for the peerless, no glory is to be found on the battlefield—only massacre.
A draconic howl sounds from amidst the carnage—a note as lonely as the moon.
evo.skill_text: Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 4 damage. Super-Evolve: Deal damage to all enemy followers instead.

common.name: Battleforged Dragon Keeper
common.flavour_text:
I exist in negatives. I am neither dragon nor human.
My mother neither wanted me, nor cared enough to discard me.
I am beholden to nothing and no one but myself.
common.skill_text: Enhance (7): Summon a Vastwing Dragon.

evo.flavour_text: She grew up in the place between, suspended between dragons and humans. Though she lacked the love of kin, she was also unburdened by hate for otherness. By not belonging to a single nation, she was a daughter of the world.
evo.skill_text: Enhance (7): Summon a Vastwing Dragon.

common.name: Dragonsign
common.flavour_text:
From the smoke of war, a flash of light,
Resolve is hardened, great wings take flight,
Abandon desires, kneel down and pray,
The flame of the dragon will light the way.
common.skill_text: Gain 1 max play point. Then, if you have 10 max play points, draw a card.

common.name: Mistress of the Fanged
common.flavour_text: That which you ought to fear is of flesh—not fantasy. Mighty fangs tear through the darkness; a palpable terror inconceivable of any frivolous ghost tale. Best to pay the wolves the respect they are owed. —Lurkers of the Night, Chapter 1
common.skill_text: Storm Bane

evo.flavour_text: A puff of her pipe, and you'll know that your end is nigh. Be as swift of foot as she is to avoid paying the price for crossing her—your very blood. —Lurkers of the Night, Final Chapter
evo.skill_text: Storm Bane

common.name: Night Fiend
common.flavour_text: Most eyes are wont to open with the sunrise and shutter with moonlight's gleam. Yet, there exist eyes that gleam beneath the stars' gentle glow. Such are the eyes of the those who dare to live in darkness.
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.

evo.flavour_text:
To hunt within the shadows, one must allow the darkness inside.
—The mantra of a vampire hunter
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.

common.name: Devious Lesser Mummy
common.flavour_text: The dead are wrapped in pure white cloth in anticipation of the life to come. But graverobbers be warned—those well-wishes can quickly become a curse. If you do not wish to meet death's cold embrace, steer clear of the mummy's chambers.
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Give this follower Storm.

evo.flavour_text: King or peasantry? Man or even beast? The swaddling bandages mark the dead as one and the same. —Scroll of the Lich King, Final Passage
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Give this follower Storm.

common.name: Chaos Cyclone
common.flavour_text: Life is akin to the pages of a tome. Hatred anew can always be found by turning to the verses bookmarked by animosity, enmity, and malice.
common.skill_text: Select a Mode to activate. 1. Draw a follower. 2. Reanimate (2).

questions.question: Can I select Mode 2 for Chaos Cyclone even if no allied followers that cost 2 or less have been destroyed this match?
questions.answer: Yes. Nothing will happen.

common.name: Lilith, Enchanting Succubus
common.flavour_text: It's lovely to be able to see you again so soon! Hmm? You don't ever remember meeting me? Oh, you tease! I've never forgotten about you! You're just way too cute inside those dreams of yours!
common.skill_text: Last Words: Add a Bat to your hand.

evo.flavour_text: Within that endlessly spreading dreamscape, a momentary tryst. Words of adoration and devotion spill from her lover's lips, but once the sun rises, it all dissipates with the morning mist.
evo.skill_text: Last Words: Add a Bat to your hand.

common.name: Amorous Necromancer
common.flavour_text: Grief begets a love most passionate; therefore death leaves the soul swelling with ecstasy. You are lucky to have met me. Come now, let us share a fiery embrace.
common.skill_text: Evolve: Summon 2 copies of Ghost. Super-Evolve: Give them Drain.

evo.flavour_text: Whom did they hate? What did they regret? These souls no longer know the answers to these queries. Sorrowful as they are, they continue to permeate the mortal realm. That is where I come in. Come now; allow thyselves to melt away in my arms.
evo.skill_text: Evolve: Summon 2 copies of Ghost. Super-Evolve: Give them Drain.

common.name: Soul Predation
common.flavour_text: Not once in your entire life have you ever sought the consent of the beasts and flora you devoured. Why should I do so now? I'm thinking it's about time to dig in!
common.skill_text: Select an allied follower on the field and destroy it. Draw 2 cards.

questions.question: Can I select a super-evolved allied follower for Soul Predation?
questions.answer: Yes. The follower won't be destroyed, but you will draw 2 cards.

common.name: Soulcure Sister
common.flavour_text: Welcome to our church's infirmary! Dearest me, I can sense just how much pain you must be in. Under the light of my holy staff, that pain is sure to go away and not to come back another day!
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Restore 5 defense to your leader.
Ward

evo.flavour_text:
A wave of her staff is all it takes to see her patients' eyes light up. The way they carry themselves forthwith, you would believe that they were never injured in the first place.
"The first tap may hurt a little, but soon the pain will be all gone!"
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Restore 5 defense to your leader.
Ward

common.name: Fox of Purity
common.flavour_text: The appearance of the fox incites both suspicion and admiration. Interpret it as an omen good or bad—that depends largely upon your upbringing.
common.skill_text: Ward

evo.flavour_text: In a dark forest at the ends of the earth, there resided an evil man and his partner, a deceptive fox. Cleansed by the light they found within the forest, the monk and his partner, a holy fox, now spread the word of that immaculate place.
evo.skill_text: Ward

common.name: Winged Warrior
common.flavour_text: Human legs cannot summit the crags of the holy peak. The bodies of ground-dwelling beasts cannot survive in the surrounding harsh environ. One such as you cannot possibly hope to invade our sacred realm.
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Select another allied follower on the field and give it +1/+1.
Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.

evo.flavour_text: Ah, the mightiest of wings and the finest of armor. Who would dare attempt to disturb our peace? Best go on the patrol, just in case. Wait... Where was the nest again?
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Select another allied follower on the field and give it +1/+1.
Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.

common.name: Avian Statue
common.flavour_text:
I seek wonder to soothe my sorrows.
—Worshipper of the statue
common.skill_text:
Countdown (2) Last Words: Summon a Regal Falcon.
Engage (2): Advance this amulet's count by 2.

common.name: Ironfist Priest
common.flavour_text: It's hard to get folks to listen to the good word around these parts. Luckily for me, I know a thing or two about persuasion.
common.skill_text: Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field with 3 defense or less and banish it. Super-Evolve: Banish all enemy followers with 3 defense or less instead.

evo.flavour_text: You wouldn't believe how many followers I've gained since I started preaching with these fists. I have the heavens to thank for allowing me to bash that wall of ignorance to dust.
evo.skill_text: Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field with 3 defense or less and banish it. Super-Evolve: Banish all enemy followers with 3 defense or less instead.

common.name: Sacred Griffon
common.flavour_text: Their majestic appearance should not warrant veneration from thee, but thou ought to approach them with awe just the same. —Guide to Griffon Rearing
common.skill_text: Ward Whenever you Engage an amulet, give this follower Storm.

evo.flavour_text:
All the whelps think they can become fine griffon riders. When it finally comes time to mount one, I enjoy seeing their faces lose all color.
—An experienced griffon knight
evo.skill_text: Ward Whenever you Engage an amulet, give this follower Storm.

common.name: Winged Statue
common.flavour_text:
On the wings of this towering statue are our teachings. Offer prayer, and you will yet be saved from certain demise.
—A message to the wingless
common.skill_text:
Countdown (4) Last Words: Summon a Holy Falcon.
Engage (1): Advance this amulet's count by 1.

common.name: Kitty Cannoneer
common.flavour_text: Need a paw? Then I've got the meowcenary guild for you! But beware, you might just get a frisky alley cat!
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Add a Gear of Ambition to your hand.
Rush

evo.flavour_text: This ain't no time for a cat nap! We're at war! I've got nine lives, and I'm putting them all on the line!
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Add a Gear of Ambition to your hand.
Rush

common.name: Puppet Lancer
common.flavour_text: My master sent me to the front lines while he hides again... How does he control me so well from so far away? Oh, it's simple, really—he doesn't!
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Add an Enhanced Puppet to your hand.

evo.flavour_text: I shouldn't bad-mouth my master? Why? It's not like he can hear me from all the way back there!
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Add an Enhanced Puppet to your hand.

common.name: Mechanized Beast
common.flavour_text: If you want cannon fodder, create a war machine in man's image. If you want a force to be reckoned with, look to the realm of beasts. —Mechabeasts: A History
common.skill_text: Bane Ward

evo.flavour_text: As machines became more beastlike, they came to see the ugliness of their human masters and their futile wars.
evo.skill_text: Bane Ward

common.name: Bullet from Beyond
common.flavour_text: I told you my sniping skills are out of this world!
common.skill_text: Select an enemy follower on the field and destroy it. Add a Gear of Ambition and Gear of Remembrance to your hand.

questions.question: Can I play Bullet from Beyond even if there aren't any enemy followers on the field?
questions.answer: No, you can't.

common.name: Electric Whip Lass
common.flavour_text: I'm armed for the freakin' circus... I'll be swiss cheese before I can even flick my wrist.
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Add a Gear of Remembrance to your hand.

evo.flavour_text: Like, I totally get what you're thinking. No way a normal girl can win this fight with a whip... Unfortunately for you, I'm not like other girls.

questions.question: What does "deal X damage split between all enemy followers" mean?
questions.answer:
Damage split between enemies is dealt in order from oldest enemy follower on the field to newest (right to left), with each follower taking up to its defense in damage before the subsequent follower takes damage.

For example, if there are 3 enemy followers on the field with defense values of 3, 3, and 2 from right to left, and X is 7, then they will take 3, 3, and 1 damage, respectively.

questions.question: What does "deal 7 damage split between all enemy followers" mean?
questions.answer:
Damage split between enemies is dealt in order from oldest enemy follower on the field to newest (right to left), with each follower taking up to its defense in damage before the subsequent follower takes damage.

For example, if there are 3 enemy followers on the field with defense values of 3, 3, and 2 from right to left, they take 3, 3, and 1 damage, respectively.

questions.question: If Aragavy, Eternal Hunter's Evolve ability activates when both leaders are at 3 defense, who will win the game?
questions.answer: Your opponent will win.

common.flavour_text: Long ago, the Mad God ruled over the land with an iron fist. His tyranny ushered in an era of despair, a true dark age. But one day, from that darkness came light—a young man concealing his face with a mask. —Tale of Eight Masks, Chapter 1
common.skill_text:
Ambush
Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field and destroy it.

evo.flavour_text:
Travel north to the church.
Seek the rebel inquisitor who hides himself away.
Unmask him for what he truly is—the heavenly sphere of the west.
evo.skill_text:
Ambush
Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field and destroy it.

common.name: Lapis, Shining Seraph
common.flavour_text: The heavens oft ask of man if righteousness resides in their hearts. Those who are aware of their duties will surely answer that it is so. The tribulations of this life are a test. Show me that you possess the greatest of perseverance.
common.skill_text: Last Words: Gain Crest: Lapis, Shining Seraph.

questions.question: If I already have Crest: Lapis, Shining Seraph, will Lapis's Last Words ability give me another?
questions.answer: No, you can't have more than one of the same crest.

evo.flavour_text: The heavens do not offer nectars, for only tribulation can guide one to righteousness. Only those who partake and persevere until the end will be considered the children of heaven. Thou who hast taken this great step, hear now my guidance!
evo.skill_text: Last Words: Gain Crest: Lapis, Shining Seraph.

common.name: Pact of the Beast Princess
common.flavour_text: The beast cares not for morality or desires—its only god is its mortal master. Stripping away the superfluous words from prayer, the beast simply roars at the heavens.
common.skill_text:
Countdown (2) Last Words: Summon a Holyflame Tiger.
Engage (1): Advance this amulet's count by 1.

common.name: Unholy Vessel
common.flavour_text: As faith and prayer decay, so too do the offerings. ―Chronicles of a Church's Final Days
common.skill_text: Engage: Destroy this card and all followers.

common.name: Rodeo, Anathema of Judgment
common.flavour_text: An assignment must measure up to its prospects. Senseless killing is a forbidden act, a sign of inferiority. Death must be balanced by what's to be gained. Thus, his furnace-forged weapons bestow fair judgment. Only the wicked will be embraced by Thanatos.
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Select a card in your hand and discard it. Summon 3 random differently named amulets from your deck that cost 3 or less.
Super-Evolve: Destroy a random enemy follower with the highest attack. Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.

questions.answer: Yes. It will summon 3 random differently named amulets from your deck that cost 3 or less.

evo.flavour_text:
An Anathema whose true form is Hephaestus, Rodeo Waltair is capable of fabricating powerful items akin to magical armaments. With his eleven unique fabrications, his might in combat is unmatched.
"Myths are what gods leave behind."
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Select a card in your hand and discard it. Summon 3 random differently named amulets from your deck that cost 3 or less.
Super-Evolve: Destroy a random enemy follower with the highest attack. Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.

common.name: Jeanne, Saintly Knight
common.flavour_text: The heavens are righteous—bastions of mercy and peace. Their blessings do not extend to this profane field of battle. Yet here I still stand, my will unsullied!

Ward

evo.flavour_text: The heavens are just. The heavens are kind. Let those same virtues take root in your heart, for the heavens do not bless this profane field of battle. The blessings of the heavens reside in the hearts of the unsullied!
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Deal 6 damage to all enemy followers. Give all other allied followers on the field +2/+4.
Ward

common.name: Salefa, Guardian of Water
common.flavour_text:
She lays in perpetual slumber, unaware as the world passes her by. Yet even in the deepest sleep, her unwavering compassion is steadfast.
"Yawn... Still so sleepy. Salefa's not cut out for working... but Salefa's overflowing with divine power from that nap."
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Restore 3 defense to your leader.
Ward

evo.flavour_text: In Valeria dwell four guardian deities. Amongst them is Salefa, Guardian of Water. She ensures a bountiful harvest and directs torrential downfalls toward any approaching enemy.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Restore 3 defense to your leader.
Ward
Evolve: Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.

common.name: Elise, Electrifying Inventor
common.flavour_text: Devastation came swift and without warning. In an instant, our home was destroyed. Yet from the ashes of our land rose a new hope—a resistance movement determined to fight back against our oppressors. —The Rhomgand Resistance, Part 1
common.skill_text: Last Words: Add a Gear of Remembrance to your hand.

evo.flavour_text: Sure, I was pretty spooked seein' our home in flames, but then the Resistance gave me and everybody else a new purpose! Now I'm makin' weapons that'll set our hearts—and our enemies—on fire!
evo.skill_text: Last Words: Add a Gear of Remembrance to your hand.

common.name: Dirk, Metal Mercenary
common.flavour_text: Exposed to despair, our hope and dreams crumbled away. Yet the hopeless now understood what we lost, and our desire to protect what remained was stronger than ever. —The Rhomgand Resistance, Part 2
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Summon a Fortifier Artifact.

evo.flavour_text: No man left behind. That's what the Resistance said as they saved me, an enemy mercenary... From then on, I knew I wanted to be their shield—protecting them as they once protected me.
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Summon a Fortifier Artifact.

common.name: Ironheart Hunter
common.flavour_text:
You call me a monster, and I say to look in a mirror.
You label this slaughter, but all I see are rats that need to be purged.
You shout for me to stop, but I assure you, I'm just getting started.
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Add a Gear of Ambition to your hand.
Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 3 damage.

evo.flavour_text: Mercy? Where was your mercy when you attacked my home? When you pointed your weapons at crying mothers and children? No... There will be no mercy for you.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Add a Gear of Ambition to your hand.
Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 3 damage.

common.name: Medical-Grade Assassin
common.flavour_text: Do not be afraid. I am here to help. I see you require an emergency amputation. I will begin immediately. Why are you struggling? I promise it will only hurt for a moment.
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Add an Enhanced Puppet to your hand.
Once on each of your turns, when an allied Puppetry follower enters the field, give it Bane.

questions.question: If I summon 2 copies of Enhanced Puppet with Puppet Shield when there's an allied Medical-Grade Assassin on the field, will both copies get Bane?
questions.answer: No, only the first copy will get Bane.

evo.flavour_text: Once just a medical assistant android, his programming was altered to make him a killer. Now, he sees infection in his victims, and a scalpel in place of his blade. So he continues to cut, and cut, and cut... hoping to stave off the infection.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Add an Enhanced Puppet to your hand.
Once on each of your turns, when an allied Puppetry follower enters the field, give it Bane.

common.name: Puppet Shield
common.flavour_text: The soulless puppet makes the perfect shield for its heartless creator. —A Guide to Puppetry and Self Defense
common.skill_text: Summon 2 copies of Enhanced Puppet.

common.name: Artifact Recharge
common.flavour_text:
"Thank you for your help. The artifact's energy levels have finally stabilized."
"My pleasure. Now the only limitation on our experiments will be the number of subjects..."
—Artifact research team member & team lead
common.skill_text: Add a Gear of Ambition and Gear of Remembrance to your hand.

common.name: Rukina, Resistance Leader
common.flavour_text: But hopes and dreams aren't enough to protect anyone. The threat of death is ever present, and despair is all but guaranteed. But great rewards await those who persevere. —The Rhomgand Resistance, Part 3
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Add a Gear of Ambition and Gear of Remembrance to your hand.
Evolve: Summon a Striker Artifact.

evo.flavour_text: I only created the Resistance as a way to survive, yet they all call me a hero. I'm no hero, but if my comrades are willing to entrust their hopes and dreams to me, I will fight for them.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Add a Gear of Ambition and Gear of Remembrance to your hand.
Evolve: Summon a Striker Artifact.

common.name: Lovestruck Puppeteer
common.flavour_text: Apologies, my dearest. The present I picked up especially for you just wouldn't stop wailing. It's just not fair... You're much more deserving of life than this... fickle creature.
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Add a Puppet to your hand.
Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.

evo.flavour_text: Go on... Open it. Oh, I can't wait to see your smile light up when you discover what's inside! And don't worry about the packaging, love—we'll just throw it out anyway.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Add a Puppet to your hand.
Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.

common.name: Noah, Thread of Death
common.flavour_text: I only hone my accursed skills to kill the one who bestowed them on me. There once was a time where I saw a future with my darling, but that bastard took her and made that atrocity. So now I only live for vengeance.
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Add 3 copies of Puppet to your hand. Give all Puppetry followers in your hand +1/+0.

evo.flavour_text: These threads used to bring joy, whether they were puppet strings or stitching on my beloved's dress... But no longer. Now I live only to kill you, Master!
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Add 3 copies of Puppet to your hand. Give all Puppetry followers in your hand +1/+0.

common.name: Stream of Life
common.flavour_text:
My life may be artificial, but I assure you, my ambitions are not.
—Safira

common.name: Doomwright Resurgence

common.name: Miriam, the Resolute
common.flavour_text: If being strong means hurting people, then I don't need strength... or so I said. But decisions have consequences, and in the end, I put my friend in danger. So no more running. This strength may be a burden, but with it, I will protect everyone!
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Add a Gear of Ambition and Gear of Remembrance to your hand.
Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.

evo.flavour_text: We created her body, her mind... What's to say we can't create her dreams, mold them to our own? No, no... We sought to create life, not a doll. Let her have her dreams, and we shall simply watch over her.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Add a Gear of Ambition and Gear of Remembrance to your hand.
Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.

common.name: Sylvia, Garden Executioner
common.flavour_text:
Hush, little baby, don't say a word.
Forget all the frightening tales you've heard.
Tales of monsters, big and tall.
For I will protect you from them all.
common.skill_text:

evo.flavour_text:
Rock-a-bye, baby, on the tree top,
Swayed by your dreams, the cradle does rock.
Rise from your sleep, and down you will fall,
So I will stop baby from waking at all.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Select a Mode to activate. 1. Draw 2 cards. 2. Restore 4 defense to your leader.
Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field and destroy it. Super-Evolve: Select 2 instead.

common.flavour_text: The puppets he created were shaped by his envy and became grasping, covetous. Many masters believe it an act of god to bestow want on a doll. But not him. For him, the transcendent choose subservience, while the mindless are thralls to ambition.

evo.flavour_text: First, he disowned his failures. Next, his disciples. Finally, he forsook himself. But no matter how many parts of his body he mechanized, he could not sate the animal hunger in his soul. The hunger that drove him to create—the hunger that made him.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon 3 copies of Enhanced Puppet.
Evolve: Give all allied Puppetry followers on the field Ward and "Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader."

Though she may not have any recollection of her time before arriving, she remembers every moment she has since spent on this planet. Do not fear relying upon her.
"I know a bit more than you, after all. Hehe..."
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Draw a card.
Evolve: Gain Crest: Eudie, Maiden Reborn.

common.name: Orchis, Newfound Heart
common.flavour_text: This heart brings me sadness. This heart brings me pain. Yet this pain... is proof I have loved. The strings connecting me to my master may be gone, but surely, a new love will grip my strings some day.

Whenever an allied Puppetry follower enters the field, give it Storm and Bane.

evo.flavour_text: What takes years to weave can be undone in a second... When you open your heart to love, you also invite pain. But I won't shut myself off again. I will seek new connections, now and forever. For that is my life's purpose.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon a Lloyd.
Whenever an allied Puppetry follower enters the field, give it Storm and Bane.
Super-Evolve: Summon 2 copies of Enhanced Puppet.

common.name: Ralmia, Sonic Boom
common.flavour_text: Every flick of my wrists, every kick of my feet sends me flying past the speed of light. I am unstoppable. I am speed! But it's not enough. I want to go faster—soar higher! My heart sings, and all I want is to follow its melody!

evo.flavour_text: Scales, melodies, harmonies, rhythms—to a machine, songs are but a series of patterns. Yet her heart, if she can be said to have one, is held captive by music as she unknowingly hums along to the rousing beat.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Select 3 Artifact followers in your hand that cost 5 or less and summon an exact copy of each.
Super-Evolve: Give all allied Artifact followers on the field +1/+1.

common.name: Goblin
common.flavour_text:
"Telling a goblin what to do."
—An idiom used to describe futile acts

evo.flavour_text: One can only be deemed an adventurer after having studied under a goblin. Every little odd thing they do is a little adventure unto themselves.

common.name: Silent Rider
common.flavour_text: Blame not the blood in your veins, and walk on your own path. Answer to none, not even the Creator. To be bound by the shackles of blood is a betrayal of the self.
common.skill_text: Storm

evo.flavour_text: Strike down all who would stand in the way of your free will, even if they share your heritage. Be baptized in their blood, and break free of the shackles passed down to you. —The Hellrime Comedy, Verse I
evo.skill_text: Storm

common.name: Servant of Cocytus
common.flavour_text: Supplant the joy of returning to your homeland with hatred. Abandon all mercy before the gates of heaven, and expect no salvation behind those bolted doors.

evo.flavour_text: If heaven is merciful, what of the damned? Forget not that banishment was crafted by divine hands. Be baptized in Antenora, and betray the very homeland that forsook you. —The Hellrime Comedy, Verse II

common.name: Demon of Purgatory
common.flavour_text: They who deserve veneration await you not in the clouds, but deep below the earth itself. Hang thy head and let your tears fall. Blessed by the damned, they shall serve as your guide to splendor.

questions.answer: Yes. It will deal 6 damage to the enemy leader.

evo.flavour_text: Share not your home with the unfallen when they beseech your aid. Be baptized in Ptolomea, and renounce the arrogance of hospitality. —The Hellrime Comedy, Verse III
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Select 2 enemy followers on the field and deal 6 damage to them and the enemy leader.

common.name: Astaroth's Reckoning
common.flavour_text: Those who would dare to determine that which is sinful are tyrants. Reach out; grasp the fruit without fear of retribution. Be baptized in Judecca, and rebel against the lords of heaven. —The Hellrime Comedy, Verse IV
common.skill_text: Set the enemy leader's max defense to 1.

common.name: Fairy
common.flavour_text: There are as many fairy sightings as there are leaves in the forest. Most claim wildly different things, but there is one common vine connecting the stories: "Beware of fairy tricks."
common.skill_text: Rush

evo.flavour_text:
The witnesses may have been unreliable; they may have had run-ins with different fairies; they may even have fallen victim to illusion. Only one thing is certain: They have been toyed with.
—Analytical paper on fairies
evo.skill_text: Rush

common.name: Deepwood Bounty
common.flavour_text: The largesse of nature is to be preserved for all time and shared with all living things. Before self-interest arrived with his lackey, logic, this was a universal and instinctual truth.
common.skill_text: Restore 1 defense to your leader.

common.name: Bramble Burst
common.flavour_text: A yearning for beauty is what turns a man's heart crimson.
common.skill_text: Select an enemy follower on the field or the enemy leader and deal it 3 damage.

common.name: Knight
common.flavour_text: Honor, fealty, justice—in every knightly fiber of his knightly body, there dwells a knightly virtue.

evo.flavour_text: I fight for home. No matter where this war takes me, into what strange and terrible lands, I will never lose sight of that.

common.name: Steelclad Knight
common.flavour_text: Strength is akin to raw ore. To properly wield it, you must first shape it with your convictions.

evo.flavour_text: Spend long enough on the battlefield, and all that grime and smoke clouds your vision. The whole world starts looking brutal and ugly. It's my lord's ambition that reminds me there's something beautiful at the end of it all.

common.name: Clay Golem
common.flavour_text:
Ooo, oo ooo... (I can't see the runes on my body...)
Ooooo? (Maybe if I bend... like this?)
Oo! Oooo! (There they are!)

evo.flavour_text: Carve the rune for truth into this golem. Now, until what is true no longer exists, this golem shall be thy servant. —Creating Golems, The Basics

common.name: Guardian Golem
common.flavour_text:
O steadfast guardian, you are my last hope. Grant this old man's last request and guard this secret. Prevent any trespassers from discovering this forbidden knowledge.
—The Dying Words of an Old Man
common.skill_text: Ward

evo.flavour_text:
Outside the guardian's lair, the forbidden knowledge was passed down through the centuries, eventually coming to be known as magic. Yet the guardian, ignorant of this, remained steadfast in his pledge.
"The world cannot know. This is your duty."
evo.skill_text: Ward

common.name: Paper Shikigami
common.flavour_text: Thin and fragile though it may be, the simple stickman is more useful than any human assistant could hope to be. It can help around the house, find lost keys, tank a curse—you name it! Mastering their first shikigami is a rite of passage for any onmyoji.
common.skill_text: Rush Last Words: Spellboost your hand.

evo.flavour_text: The ability to craft shikigami is both the most basic and essential skill an aspiring onmyoji learns. One must draft their first shikigami themself, so beginners often employ the humble paper stickman.
evo.skill_text: Rush Last Words: Spellboost your hand.

common.name: Demonic Shikigami
common.flavour_text: This fearsome feat of divination knows no law but the word of its onmyoji. Blades do naught but anger it; shields cannot save you from its onslaught. Your sole consolation is that few could ever summon it.
common.skill_text: Rush Last Words: Spellboost your hand.

evo.flavour_text: A shikigami is moved by power primordial and divine. Though many onmyoji first study familiar shapes, as they grow, they learn to create the unimaginable—supernatural terrors beyond mortal form.
evo.skill_text: Rush Last Words: Spellboost your hand.

common.name: Magic Sediment
common.flavour_text: Dust forms earth, and earth is the basis of our world. Similarly, our teachings lead to wisdom, and wisdom is the basis of both our past and future. Everything we do informs the bigger picture. —The Fundamentals of Magic, Prologue
common.skill_text:
Earth Sigil
Engage (1): Gain an earth sigil.

common.name: Looking Smart!
common.flavour_text:
The other students taught me all sorts of new spells! I didn't get any better at the ones I knew, sure, but I'm learning lots at Mysteria!
—Lou, regarding her improved grades
common.skill_text: Draw 2 cards. Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower.

common.name: Celestial Shikigami
common.flavour_text: When Onmyodo masters fold with fingertips that burn with god-power, this being is what appears. The white miracle, the celestial shikigami. Before it, all who have not touched the face of divinity are as insubstantial as paper in the wind.
common.skill_text: Ward Last Words: Spellboost your hand 3 times.

evo.flavour_text:
(What do you mean, "What is that?" It says "shikigami," you imbecile. Learn to read.)
(What are those supposed to be? Doodles?)
(Let me show you the real deal...)
evo.skill_text: Ward Last Words: Spellboost your hand 3 times.

common.name: Noble Shikigami
common.flavour_text: Most shikigami are small facsimiles—approximations of divinity. This, however, is elemental mastery. Subjugation of the zodiac. A god of calamity sworn to its maker. But what mortal could possibly create an entity such as this?

Ward Aura

evo.flavour_text: (Tch. Look at these idiots, excited over enchanted scrap paper. I'd try to pound some sense into their skulls, but with this shikigami, I'd be putting them in their graves before putting them in their places.)
evo.skill_text:
When this follower enters the field, give it +X/+Y. X/Y is the total base attack/defense of allied Shikigami followers destroyed this turn.
Ward Aura

An influx of magic stirs the immortal retainer.
 "O Spirit of War, awaken!"

evo.flavour_text:
The spellweaver effortlessly conjures her undying sword.
"Spirit, fell mine enemies. Smite all who seek Mysteria's destruction!"
evo.skill_text: Rush Ward At the end of your opponent's turn, destroy this card.

common.name: Fire Drake Whelp

Had an unexpected find today. Came across a hatchling. While baby dragons are known to fly straight from the shell, this one made no attempt to flap its wings.
—Field notes on an active volcano, 1
common.skill_text: Intimidate

This species abandons their eggs in volcanic craters, where they are incubated by heat from the lava. Like any child, the hatchling imprints upon this environment and loves it as a mother.
—Field notes on an active volcano, 2
evo.skill_text: Intimidate

common.name: Vastwing Dragon
common.flavour_text: Dragons vary in physical appearance, and are not classified as such due to size, number of limbs, or wingspan. Instead, dragons are defined by their bloodlust.
common.skill_text: Intimidate

evo.flavour_text:
Plagues and natural disasters are dangerous, but they bear no malice because they lack sentience. Beware bloodlust, for it is death given purpose.
—Folk wisdom regarding dragons
evo.skill_text: Intimidate

common.name: Otohime's Bodyguard
common.flavour_text: Don't be fooled by their small statures—Otohime's loyal guards are among the sea's greatest.

evo.flavour_text: I've been serving Otohime since I was thiiis tall, but look at me now! I feel like I've really grown both as a guard and a perso—huh? W-wait! I swear I won't grow taller than her, so don't kick me ouuut!
evo.skill_text: Storm Ward

common.name: Supreme Golden Dragon

common.skill_text: Ward

evo.flavour_text: Honoring its vow, the golden gleam sets off on a journey with its sworn brothers. Though it ends up in a strange land, its purpose remains the same. Every day is an adventure as it shapes this new world to its image.
evo.skill_text: Ward

common.name: Supreme Silver Dragon
common.flavour_text: The silver sheen within the storms is that of peerless claws. It is a roaring incarnation of hubris, a true dragon―untainted by mortal blood. Feared and worshipped, it rules a mountain peak above the clouds.
common.skill_text: Rush

evo.flavour_text: Honoring its vow, the silver sheen sets off on a journey with its sworn brothers. Though it once spent its days in mindless boredom, its fortune has since changed for the better. Every day is fulfilling as it shapes this chaotic world to its image.
evo.skill_text: Rush

common.name: Skeleton
common.flavour_text: The hero walks the path of glory, seeking honor and the spoils of war. The undead soldier walks the path of destruction, seeking nothing else. The sight of one inspires hope, while the other conveys nothing but despair.

evo.flavour_text: Numerous achievements created a life of luxury and sloth. Ironically, it was not until after he had lost his flesh and blood that the hero remembered his swordsmanship.

common.name: Bat
common.flavour_text:
Peer not at them. Do not chase nor approach them.
—Advice from a villager
Seek them out. Give chase and shoot.
—Advice from a hunter
common.skill_text: Drain

evo.flavour_text: To the powerless, they are an omen. To the powerful, they are a sign of the struggles to come. Run away or approach; it matters not to the lord at the center of the swarm.
evo.skill_text: Drain

common.name: Ghost
common.flavour_text: Lingering attachments twist a soul in all manner of wicked ways, dooming them to a wretched eternity spent in darkness.
common.skill_text: Storm When this card leaves the field, banish it. At the end of your turn, banish this card.

evo.flavour_text:
What is it that the dead cannot let go of? How did they pass on? Why do they still desire to live? These are questions asked only by amateurs.
—An experienced exorcist
evo.skill_text: Storm When this card leaves the field, banish it. At the end of your turn, banish this card.

common.name: Mimi, Right Paw Hellhound
common.flavour_text: Woof! You look like you're up to no good! Where do you think you're going? Ain't nobody gettin' out of the underworld! Not while Mimi's around!
common.skill_text: Rush Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.

questions.question: If I attack and destroy an enemy Mimi, Right Paw Hellhound with a super-evolved follower when both leaders are at 1 defense, who will win the game?
questions.answer: You will win.

evo.flavour_text: Coco's got a lot to say about me, but I'm the trusty right paw for a reason! Besides, I got Coco beat when it comes to fire!
evo.skill_text: Rush Last Words: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.

common.name: Coco, Left Paw Hellhound
common.flavour_text:
This watchdog of the underworld manifest as an arm of Cerberus. Sometimes he fights with Mimi over who is the right arm. 
"I ruffed 'em up way better than Mimi today!"
"Hey, that's enough yappin' outta both of you!"
common.skill_text: Rush Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.

questions.question: If I attack and destroy an enemy Coco, Left Paw Hellhound with a super-evolved follower when the enemy leader is at 1 defense, will I win the game? Or will Coco's Last Words ability restore defense to the enemy leader?
questions.answer: You will win.

evo.flavour_text: Two pups and a hellhound come together to form one fiery demon. Don't let their cute looks fool you—those flames can melt even the rocks of purgatory.
evo.skill_text: Rush Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.

common.name: Holy Falcon
common.flavour_text: Angels may fall as they are possessive of free will. A messenger without a will is not deceived and does not sway. Pure and naive of temperament, they convey the teachings of the heavens.
common.skill_text: Storm

evo.flavour_text: Angels' words are oft misconstrued, resulting in war and strife. The winged ones would grow remorseful and wont to entertain the folly of demons. The heavens came to need messengers of a more naive temperament.
evo.skill_text: Storm

common.name: Holyflame Tiger
common.flavour_text: Angels may act with mercy, as they are possessive of free will. A messenger without a will serves as a merciless fang. Pure and naive of temperament, they feed on the enemies of the heavens.
common.skill_text: Rush

evo.flavour_text: Angels oft embrace their enemies, even demons. They come to let their guard down, are betrayed, and even slain. The heavens came to need messengers of a more naive temperament.
evo.skill_text: Rush

common.name: Regal Falcon
common.flavour_text: Angels may turn their blades on their creators, as they are possessive of free will. A messenger without a will can only flap its wings. Pure and naive of temperament, they work only for the heavens.
common.skill_text: Storm

evo.flavour_text: Angels oft endure harsh rebuke from their creators. They grow resentful, and forsake the holy teachings. The heavens came to need messengers of a more naive temperament.
evo.skill_text: Storm

common.name: Puppet
common.flavour_text: The best puppets are made in man's image. Shape them with the same freedoms that you and I enjoy. —Puppets as People, Chapter 1: Expectations
common.skill_text: Rush At the end of your opponent's turn, destroy this card.

evo.flavour_text: The best puppets are made in man's image. Bind them with the same constraints that you and I suffer. —Puppets as People, Chapter 2: Reality
evo.skill_text: Rush At the end of your opponent's turn, destroy this card.

common.name: Enhanced Puppet
common.flavour_text: The best puppets are made in man's image. They should resemble humanity not only in body, but also in spirit. —Puppets as People, Chapter 3: Perceptions
common.skill_text: Rush At the end of your opponent's turn, destroy this card.

evo.flavour_text: The best puppets are made in man's image. For this is what man believes and what he desires. —Puppets as People, Chapter 4: Prejudice
evo.skill_text: Rush At the end of your opponent's turn, destroy this card.

common.name: Gear of Ambition
common.flavour_text: Relics lie about us like the corpses of dreams, the ghosts of civilizations. Yet the gears of progress turn on, driving us toward the stars. —Age of Destruction, Gear of Ambition
common.skill_text:
Fuse: Artifact amulets When you Fuse to this card, transform it into a Striker Artifact.
Can't be played.

common.name: Gear of Remembrance
common.flavour_text: Relics lie about us like monuments to failure, totems of regret. Yet the gears of war turn on, groaning beneath the burden of peace. —Age of Destruction, Gear of Remembrance
common.skill_text:
Fuse: Artifact amulets When you Fuse to this card, transform it into a Fortifier Artifact.
Can't be played.

common.name: Striker Artifact
common.flavour_text: Sick of stagnation, the people rebelled and seized the gears of change. What once was used for peace was now used for war, and civilization was sent down a path of carnage. —Age of Destruction, The Crimson Period
common.skill_text:
Fuse: Artifact cards When you Fuse to this card, transform it based on the total cost of the cards fused. 1: Ominous Artifact α 2: Ominous Artifact β 3 or more: Ominous Artifact γ
Rush

evo.flavour_text: The hearts that once ached for peace were broken by the continuous conflict—as it has been, so it will be.
evo.skill_text:
Fuse: Artifact cards When you Fuse to this card, transform it based on the total cost of the cards fused. 1: Ominous Artifact α 2: Ominous Artifact β 3 or more: Ominous Artifact γ
Rush

common.name: Fortifier Artifact
common.flavour_text: Mortals have short memories. Thus, the gears returned to the battlefield once more, reaping the lives of innocents. —Age of Destruction, The Azure Period
common.skill_text:
Fuse: Artifact cards When you Fuse to this card, transform it based on the total cost of the cards fused. 1: Ominous Artifact α 2: Ominous Artifact β 3 or more: Ominous Artifact γ
Ward

evo.flavour_text: Cling to the faint light you know, and you lose the future to darkness.
evo.skill_text:
Fuse: Artifact cards When you Fuse to this card, transform it based on the total cost of the cards fused. 1: Ominous Artifact α 2: Ominous Artifact β 3 or more: Ominous Artifact γ
Ward

common.name: Ominous Artifact α
common.flavour_text: Greed is no mere vice. It is an all-consuming monster, robbing even the land of its warmth.
common.skill_text:
Fuse: Ominous Artifact β and Ominous Artifact γ When you've Fused both to this card, transform it into a Masterwork Artifact Ω.
At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.

questions.question: If I fuse an Ominous Artifact β to an Ominous Artifact α in my hand one turn, then fuse an Ominous Artifact γ to the same Ominous Artifact α the next turn, will it transform into a Masterwork Artifact Ω?
questions.answer: Yes, it will.

questions.question: If I fuse an Ominous Artifact β to an Ominous Artifact α in my hand one turn, then fuse an Ominous Artifact γ to the same Ominous Artifact α the next turn, will it transform into a Masterwork Artifact Ω?
questions.answer: Yes, it will.

questions.question: If I fuse an Ominous Artifact β to an Ominous Artifact α in my hand one turn, then fuse an Ominous Artifact γ to the same Ominous Artifact α the next turn, will it transform into a Masterwork Artifact Ω?
questions.answer: Yes, it will.

questions.question: If I fuse an Ominous Artifact β to an Ominous Artifact α in my hand one turn, then fuse an Ominous Artifact γ to the same Ominous Artifact α the next turn, will it transform into a Masterwork Artifact Ω?
questions.answer: Yes, it will.

evo.flavour_text: A sun shatters, collapses in on itself, and another solar system is lost. Without stars to wish upon, what becomes of our hopes and dreams?
evo.skill_text:
Fuse: Ominous Artifact β and Ominous Artifact γ When you've Fused both to this card, transform it into a Masterwork Artifact Ω.
At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.

common.name: Ominous Artifact β
common.flavour_text: Peace died not with a whimper, but a bang. Planets splintered as the war among the stars raged.
common.skill_text: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.

evo.flavour_text: As resources dwindle, lives are lost, and another planet goes quiet. When the masses can no longer look up at the stars with wonder, what is left?
evo.skill_text: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.

common.name: Ominous Artifact γ
common.flavour_text: Decay is natural; devastation is defined by its speed. The Great Calamity will consume all dimensions at once, bending even the light of the stars.
common.skill_text: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.

evo.flavour_text:
The skies will shatter, the light will warp, and dust will consume the stars.
At the end of days, heaven's eternal eye shall gaze out and see nothing.
evo.skill_text: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.

common.name: Masterwork Artifact Ω
common.flavour_text:
I am the harbinger of the end. By my hand, the streams of stars will evaporate into nothingness. 
I am the giver of the last rites. The event horizon is my halo, and it signals the point of no return.
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to all enemy followers. Restore 5 defense to your leader.
Storm Ward Aura

evo.flavour_text:
I am the herald of peace. By my hand, the hatred infecting the universe shall be cleansed.
I am the giver of hope. The protostar is my beacon, and it signals a new life.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Deal 5 damage to all enemy followers. Restore 5 defense to your leader.
Storm Ward Aura

common.name: Lloyd
common.flavour_text: Though without a heart, it is not an empty shell. Within it lies the memories of a journey with a willful girl.
common.skill_text: Ward Your opponent can't select any cards other than this one for abilities.

questions.question: Will Sylvia, Garden Executioner's Super-Evolve ability activate if my opponent's field consists of an Orchis, Newfound Heart and a Lloyd?
questions.answer: Yes. It will prompt you to select Lloyd first and Orchis second, then destroy them.

evo.flavour_text:
When I despair, he stands beside me. Wherever I go, he follows. And if ever he stops moving... so too will I.
—Orchis, Newfound Heart
evo.skill_text: Ward Your opponent can't select any cards other than this one for abilities.
